useCases.title: UPI / Online Payment Scam
useCases.description: Issues related to unauthorized or fraudulent digital payments.

shouldDo: Call 1930 immediately and report the transaction
Inform your bank through its official app or helpline
Save transaction ID, date, and screenshots
shouldNotDo: Do not share OTP, PIN, or card details
Do not trust recovery calls or messages

lawyer.condition: Only if the bank refuses action or FIR is demanded

useCases.title: FIR Related Issue
useCases.description: Concerns related to FIR filing, threats, or status.

variants.trigger: Someone is threatening to file an FIR
shouldDo: Stay calm and ask for written complaint details
shouldNotDo: Do not panic or make cash payments
Do not sign any document without reading

lawyer.condition: Yes if FIR is actually registered or notice is received

useCases.title: Fake or Inflated Traffic Challan
useCases.description: Traffic fine demanded without valid offence or proof.

variants.trigger: Police demanding fine higher than expected
shouldDo: Ask for official e-challan or receipt
Ask under which offence section fine is charged
Verify challan on official portal later
shouldNotDo: Do not pay cash without receipt
Do not argue or raise voice

useCases.title: Domestic Violence / Safety Concern
useCases.description: Physical, emotional, or financial abuse at home.

shouldDo: Ensure immediate safety and move to a safe place
shouldNotDo: Do not stay alone in unsafe situation
Do not hesitate to seek help

lawyer.condition: If abuse continues or formal complaint is needed

useCases.title: Bribery Demand in Government Work
useCases.description: Illegal demand of money for official services.

variants.trigger: Official asking money to process my work
shouldDo: Ask for written reason for delay
Use official complaint or grievance portal
shouldNotDo: Do not pay cash without receipt

lawyer.condition: Yes if retaliation or notice is issued

useCases.title: Illegal or Random Tax / Fine Collection
useCases.description: Unverified tax or fine demanded by officials.

variants.trigger: Asked to pay tax or fine without written order
shouldDo: Ask for written notice or official order
shouldNotDo: Do not make on-the-spot cash payments

lawyer.condition: Yes if notice or seizure is threatened
